structure.unit: Sec. 12-2112. - SALE OF TICKETS IN EXCESS OF SEATS.

law.catch_line: SALE OF TICKETS IN EXCESS OF SEATS.
law.text: It shall be unlawful for any person operating a theater or moving picture show in the City to sell a greater number of tickets than there are seats provided for the accommodation of patrons for any performance. (Code 1959 , ยง3-2)
